BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Employees’ Retirement System to determine that members are disabled for purposes of disability pensions, if the New York State Workers’ Compensation Board determines that a member has a permanent partial disability, and the U.S. Social Security Administration determines that a member is disabled for substantial gainful (work) activity, and approved for social security disability benefits
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the New York State Governor to sign, S.2837/A.2750, enacting The Farmworkers Fair Labor Practices Act.
